forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers between 1pm and 2pm, then a chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy. nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew turned the guns on last night. Despite some cold temperatures in the area the conditions at Nub's Nob allowed for only a few hours of quality snowmaking. The team is here around the clock, ready for the next opportunity. At this point it looks like there is a turn toward colder weather right around Thanksgiving. We will continue to update the blog to keep you up to date. Think COLD and SNOW.
